name: Symploke: Legend of Gustavo Bueno (Chapter 2)
description: Symploké: The Legend of Gustavo Bueno is a classic point and click adventure set in a Spanish university and inspired in one of the most influential contemporary philosophers in the world. Play Chapter 2 ONLY if you got through Chapter 1.
minimum_requirements: OS: XP, Vista, 7, 8, 10 Processor: Intel or AMD Memory: 500 MB RAM Graphics: Direct Draw or Direct X compatible card Storage: 1 GB available space Sound Card: Direct Draw or Direct X compatible card Additional Notes: Mouse
